settings.heading: $1 spent = 1 point earned.
settings.subheading: Shop online and earn valuable points. Every 50 points earns you $5 of sympl cash that’s credited to your account for you to use on future purchases.

settings.heading: VIP Customer Service.
settings.subheading: Who wants to wait in line? Get elite customer service and direct, premium help when you need it most. Speak to brand experts within 24 hours.

settings.heading: A Symplº Gift
settings.subheading: You’re a part of our brand d.n.a – so, let’s celebrate you. Our rewards program will plug you with benefits, from special discounts to gifts with purchase, and more.

settings.heading: All Access Pass.
settings.subheading: Get First access to sales, exclusive gear, and new product drops. Plus behind-the-scenes looks into how we design and make our products, links to exclusive content and more.

settings.heading: Gear Test Pilots.
settings.subheading: Gain access to test unreleased products the team is working on. Become part of the sympl family and provide product feedback just like our athletes and ambassadors.

settings.heading: Save on gear.
settings.subheading: Get 10% off your first order when you sign up for our loyalty and rewards program.

settings.heading: Unpack Sympl Rewards.
settings.subheading: Your one stop destination to all Sympl perks, benefits, incentives, and so much more.
